On Thu, Oct 29, 2020 at 3:48 PM wrote: 
Dr. 
Hughes, 
Together with 
colleagues 
I'm one of the federal prosecutors handling 
the case of United States v.  Ghislaine Maxwell, which is scheduled to go to trial on July 12, 2021 in the 
Southern District of New York. We would be interested in speaking with you about your availability to 
testify as an expert witness at trial. Are you available for a call tomorrow or next week to discuss? 
Thanks very much, 
EFTA00024754

EFTA00024755
